results.question: How does exercise help in managing your diet?
results.correct_answer: Helps regulate my metabolism so I have a health appetite
incorrect_answers: Makes me want to eat less
Makes me lose weight
Makes me drink more so I eat less

results.question: A simple workout can effect your productivity:
results.correct_answer: Give me a natural energy boost
incorrect_answers: Give me strength to do more intensive tasks
Make me more competitive with others
Make me feel more confident

results.question: What hormones make us happy after we exercise?
results.correct_answer: endorphins
incorrect_answers: testosterones
prostoglandins
thyroxin

results.question: What is CBT an acronym for?
results.correct_answer: Cognitive Behavioural Therapy
incorrect_answers: Change By Thought
Careful But Thorough
Call Back Today

results.question: Psychologists in London claim they have cracked the code on the ideal embrace, saying hugs should last between: (countryliving.com)
results.correct_answer: five and 10 seconds
incorrect_answers: 2 and 5 minutes
1 and 2 minutes
10 to 15 minutes

results.question: Why does having a pet make a difference to your mood?
results.correct_answer: Pets can help manage loneliness and depression by giving us companionship
incorrect_answers: Make us get out to buy their food
We can talk to others about them
We can meet others with pets when in the park

results.question: How many glasses of water/liquid a day should we have?
results.correct_answer: 6 to 8
incorrect_answers: 2 to 3
4 to 6

results.question: What does water help with:
results.correct_answer: Less dehydration more clear thinking
incorrect_answers: Visiting the toilet more
More fatigue
Increasing blood pressure

results.question: How important is diet in effecting our moods?
results.correct_answer: Blood sugar fluctuations can effect our moods
incorrect_answers: Eating whatever we want makes me feel happy
Getting the correct nutrients makes my body work better so I'm happier
Not eating much makes me feel less worried about how I look

results.question: What happens when we don't eat?
results.correct_answer: The body begins to increase production of cortisol, leaving us stressed and hangry
incorrect_answers: We lose weight
We make up for it later by over-eating
We get dehydrated quickly and therefore need to drink more water to compensate

results.question: What activity does not lead to improved mood, if you can't do regular exercise?
results.correct_answer: Watching TV
incorrect_answers: Floating in a pool
Sitting in a park
Playing with your pet

results.question: What is mindfulness?
results.correct_answer: Having an awareness of feelings, bodily sensations, and surrounding environment moment by moment
incorrect_answers: Being thoughtful of others and offering to help them
Being conscious of our surroundings and the events that effect them
Having a friend check in with us to be mindful of the difficulties we are going through

results.question: Why are having goals important?
results.correct_answer: It helps us to look forward rather than in our past
incorrect_answers: Gives us a holiday to plan for
Helps us score points at football/rugby/hockey
Stops us kicking the ball all over the field and into the crowds

results.question: How does vitamin D boost our wellbeing?
results.correct_answer: Increases Serotonin, fights depression and increases happiness
incorrect_answers: Makes us get less ill as helps improve the immune system
Prevents Rickets
Helps us get a tan when sitting in the sun

results.question: Why is sleep so important to our wellbeing?
results.correct_answer: It helps us process emotional information so we can regulate
incorrect_answers: It gives us rest so we can reset and start another day
It lets us have time to dream and this helps us escape from reality
It decreases fatigue so we can have energy to interact with others in the day

results.question: What happens when we don't get enough sleep?
results.correct_answer: Lack of sleep can effect our immune systems and lead to frequent illness
incorrect_answers: Lack of sleep can lead to being less alert and falling asleep while watching tv
We slur our words when we haven't had enough sleep and people don't understand us
Lack of sleep can lead to less patience and get angry quickly leading to outbursts

results.question: What is emotional regulation?
results.correct_answer: Being in control of your emotions so that you don't become overwhelmed
incorrect_answers: Rules about emotions that have to be upheld
Expressing your emotions in a safe place
Knowing when to express your emotions and the appropriate way

results.question: What effect does sitting in the sunshine have?
results.correct_answer: It increases vitamin D production
incorrect_answers: It gives us cancer
It makes us hot
It helps us get a tan

results.question: What is melatonin vs melanin?
results.correct_answer: Melatonin is a sleep hormone, Melanin is a pigment that helps our skin darken in the sun
incorrect_answers: Melatonin is what is released to darken our skin in the sun, Melanin is a sleep hormone
Melanin breaks down Melatonin, so that our bodies can absorb vitamin D from the sun
Melanin is a type of plastic that is used for plates and cups, Melatonin is an exercise to help us tone our muscles

results.question: How does Boxing physically help our moods?
results.correct_answer: We release endorphins when we exercise so that helps improve our mood
incorrect_answers: We can pretend we are hitting the person we don't like
We have a sparring partner so we can interact socially too
We test our own limits and gain confidence

results.question: When you have a difficult task, what can you plan to look forward to,  motivate you to achieve it?
results.correct_answer: A reward to look forward to when completed
incorrect_answers: A to do list
A break in-between things
A chat with a friend

results.question: How many units of alcohol should you have a week to help improve your wellbeing?
Does caffeine help with anxiety? Why?
results.correct_answer: No, it stimulates fight or flight response and can make anxiety worse
incorrect_answers: Yes, it helps me move faster
No, it makes my heart race and I feel more panicky
Yes, it moves the hormones around by body faster so I calm down quicker

results.question: What tea can help reduce anxiety and aid with restful sleep?
results.correct_answer: Camomile tea
incorrect_answers: Regular tea
Mint tea
Green tea
